info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 4:49PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Areas of fog and light snow at times through Tuesday... Areas of fog and light snow will affect areas near the Montana Idaho border from this evening through Tuesday. This includes locations around Monida Pass on Interstate 15, Raynolds Pass on Highway 87 and the West Yellowstone area. Visibility will be below one mile at times. New snow accumulations tonight of around 1 inch are possible, with an additional 2 to 4 inches possible Monday night into Tuesday. Those traveling through this region should be alert for changing road conditions, and are reminded to slow their driving speeds down in areas of poor visibility or snow covered roadways.
